name: Hecklevision
bio:
Hecklevision is bad movies made better with guest comics and the audience texting jokes on-screen instantly!

Um, as you're aware I submitted this last year and it was accepted but didn't work out due to scheduling conflicts so I'm trying again!

Hollywood Theatre could do this at 9:30pm on Saturday 6/4 or Sunday 6/5 so let me know what you think! Tech needs would be covered by Hollywood.

PS. It required a video so I just I linked the Hackers trailer but we can do anything!
copy: Bad movies + text messages = HECKLEVISION! Through the magic of MuVChat technology, your jokes, heckles and commentary are encouraged - in TEXT form! Tap out your wittiest wisecracks with your phone and they'll appear instantly on screen! Each month, special guests will hang out to crack jokes via text with you and a few hundred of your best friends!
